markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 374 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Arqueros](/Deities.aspx?ID=244), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=117), [Imbrex](/Deities.aspx?ID=94), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=41), [Keepers of the Hearth](/Deities.aspx?ID=248), [Sairazul](/Deities.aspx?ID=107), [Soralyon](/Deities.aspx?ID=128), [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=91)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 20 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target's skin hardens like stone. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, stoneskin's duration decreases by 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The resistance increases to 10.

**Heightened (8th)** The resistance increases to 15.

**Heightened (10th)** The resistance increases to 20.
name: Stoneskin

</summary>
summary: Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.
summary_markdown: Harden a creature's skin into durable stone.
text: Stoneskin Source Core Rulebook pg. 374 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Arqueros, Dammerich, Imbrex, Irori, Kazutal, Keepers of the Hearth, Sairazul, Soralyon, Trudd Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 20 minutes --- The target's skin hardens like stone. It gains resistance 5 to physical damage, except adamantine. Each time the target is hit by a bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing attack, stoneskin's duration decreases by 1 minute. --- Heightened (6th) The resistance increases to 10. Heightened (8th) The resistance increases to 15. Heightened (10th) The resistance increases to 20.
